title: Add transparent mega menu with holographic effects to header

requirements.text: Make the header navigation in the Layout component transparent with a backdrop blur effect, removing the solid background while maintaining readability
acceptanceCriteria: Header has transparent background with backdrop-blur CSS property
Navigation remains readable over different background content

requirements.text: Transform the Layout component header navigation into a mega menu structure that displays expanded dropdown panels on hover for main navigation items (Home, Products, Cart), featuring multi-column layouts with links, descriptions, and promotional content
acceptanceCriteria: Main navigation items trigger mega menu panels on hover
Mega menu panels display in multi-column layout below the header
Panels include relevant links and content for each navigation section
Smooth transitions when opening and closing mega menu panels
Mobile-responsive behavior that collapses to accordion or drawer

requirements.text: Apply holographic gradient effects to the header navigation elements including nav links and the cart icon, using animated gradient borders and background effects that create iridescent shimmer consistent with the existing holographic effects on product cards and buttons, featuring the brand color #a932bd
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links display holographic gradient borders on hover
Cart icon has animated holographic border effect
Effects use brand color #a932bd as part of the gradient
Animations are smooth and match existing holographic effects elsewhere
Effects remain visible against the transparent header background

requirements.text: Add holographic gradient effects to the mega menu dropdown panels, including iridescent borders around the panel containers and subtle holographic background gradients that complement the transparent header and create visual cohesion with the vanguardist design aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Mega menu panels have holographic gradient borders
Panel backgrounds feature subtle iridescent gradients
Effects coordinate with header transparency and backdrop blur
Visual style matches existing holographic effects throughout the site

constraints: Maintain the existing Layout component structure with sticky header positioning
Preserve the theme-aware TS Gabrielle logo switching functionality
Keep the mobile menu functionality intact
Use the brand color #a932bd as the primary accent in holographic effects
Maintain consistency with existing holographic effects on product cards, buttons, and headings
nonGoals: Changing the navigation structure or adding new navigation items
Modifying the backend or cart functionality
